items.title: Dual-Mode Portfolio
items.shortDescription: A polymorphic portfolio with terminal and graph interfaces.
items.detailedDescription: A single React + TypeScript runtime system rendering two completely different interaction models powered by the same structured JSON data layer. Demonstrates UI abstraction, runtime state management, and data-driven rendering.
items.architectureNotes: Mode-based rendering with shared data layer. Command engine for terminal, graph engine for node visualization. All content driven by JSON files.

items.title: UI Component Library
items.shortDescription: A typed, themeable component system with design tokens.
items.detailedDescription: Built a comprehensive React component library with full TypeScript support, design token system, and automated documentation. Includes 40+ components with accessibility built in.
items.architectureNotes: Compound component pattern with context-based theming. Automated visual regression testing with Chromatic.

items.title: State Machine Forms
items.shortDescription: Form engine powered by XState finite state machines.
items.detailedDescription: A declarative form builder that uses finite state machines to manage complex multi-step form flows. Supports conditional logic, validation, and async submissions.
items.architectureNotes: Each form is a state machine definition. Transitions handle validation, field visibility, and submission. Zero re-renders on field changes.
